category: Herbs that Clean Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat and resolves Fire toxicity

indications: Epidemic outbreaks of Fire toxin that affects people regardless of their constitutions (severe contagious diseases)
Fire toxins anywhere in the body (Chuang Yung), especially the Lungs and throat
Often used for mouth ulcers and throat Bi

action.primary: Cools the Blood and dissipates maculae

indications: Maculae or other skin eruptions due to Blood Heat
Often used in cases with intense fever, irritability and changes in consciousness

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.
Contraindicated for those with no Heat.
interactions: Patients who are allergic to sulfonylureas such as: tolbutamide (Orinase), glipizide (Glucotrol) and glyburide (DiaBeta/Micronase) and sulfonamides such as: sulfadiazine, sulfisoxazole, sulfamethoxazole, trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole (Bactrim/Septra), and erythromycin/sulfisoxazole (Pediazole) may also be allergic to Da Qing Ye.

useCases: Toxic Heat sores, erysipelas, mumps, or sore throat.
Exterior Wind-Heat with fever, thirst, irritability and sore throat or early-stage febrile disorders.
Heat toxin in Warm pathogen diseases leading to Blazing Fire in both Qi, Ying and Blood Levels with a high fever, maculae sometimes impaired consciousness.
All types of pain and swelling of the throat, including diphtheria and acute tonsillitis due to Heat.
All types of pain and swelling of the throat, including diphtheria and acute tonsillitis due to Heat with a stronger effect.
Icteric and anicteric hepatitis and cholecystitis.
Icteric and anicteric hepatitis and cholecystitis with a stronger effect.
Maculae, epistaxis, and bleeding gums due to Heat in the Blood.

notes: Natural Indigo made from the prepared leaves is called #{QingDai} Qing Dai.
It is most frequently used for reducing maculation in acute infectious disease.
It is usually used as powders or pills.
Indigo is the source of indirubin used in the treatment of cancer. Research shows that it is very effective with minimal side effects in the treatment of chronic myelocytic leukemia.
It is slightly toxic and is often used externally in the treatment of skin diseases.
It is used for clearing Heart, Lung and Stomach Heat Toxin, while mobilizing both Qi and Blood Levels.
It can be used for inflammation of the brain membrane (encephalitis) due to Heat and inflammation of the spinal fluid.
It can be used both internally and externally.
It can be effective for Heat in the Gallbladder.
It eliminates sores associated with childhood nutritional impairment and from poisoned weapons.

Da Qing Ye, Indigo Naturalis Qing Dai, and Rx. Isatidis #{BanLanGen} Bei Ban Lan Gen all originate from the same plants, cool Heat in the Blood, and reduce skin blotches. Qing Dai is best for toxic sores due to Fire and Heat, rashes from Warm toxins, hemoptysis and hematemesis and childhood convulsions. Dan Qing Ye and Bei Ban Lan Gen both cool Heat toxin in the Heart and Stomach, but Da Qing Ye is usually used for rashes from Warm toxin, while Bei Ban Lan Gen is used for massive head febrile disorders and throat obstruction due to mumps.
